description: This Java class configures the OpenAPI/Swagger documentation metadata for the Notes backend service, including API info, contact, license, tags, and external documentation.

classes.name: OpenApiConfig
classes.description: Configuration class that defines the OpenAPI bean with API metadata for Swagger documentation.

methods.name: notesOpenAPI
methods.description: Creates and returns an OpenAPI object with the service's metadata, tags, and external documentation.

calls: description("Ocean Professional — A clean, modern REST API to manage notes.")
